code: public static StompTextMessageBuilder create(StompCommand command) {     return new StompTextMessageBuilder(command). }
public StompTextMessageBuilder headers(String... headerLines) {     this.headerLines.addAll(Arrays.asList(headerLines)).     return this. }
public StompTextMessageBuilder body(String body) {     this.body = body.     return this. }

public TextMessage build() {     StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(this.command.name()).append("
").     for (String line : this.headerLines) {         sb.append(line).append("
").     }     sb.append("
").     if (this.body != null) {         sb.append(this.body).     }     sb.append("�").     return new TextMessage(sb.toString()). }
